chk_activity_has_one_parent.name: chk_activity_has_one_parent
chk_activity_has_one_parent.value: ((category_id IS NOT NULL) AND (sub_category_id IS NULL)) OR ((category_id IS NULL) AND (sub_category_id IS NOT NULL))

chk_category_or_subcategory.name: chk_category_or_subcategory
chk_category_or_subcategory.value: ((category_id IS NOT NULL) AND (sub_category_id IS NULL)) OR ((category_id IS NULL) AND (sub_category_id IS NOT NULL))

events_event_type_check.name: events_event_type_check
events_event_type_check.value: (event_type)::text = ANY (ARRAY[('REVENUE'::character varying)::text, ('EXPENSE'::character varying)::text, ('ASSET'::character varying)::text, ('LIABILITY'::character varying)::text, ('EQUITY'::character varying)::text])

public.v_planning_category_totals.definition: SELECT pc.id AS category_id, pc.project_id, pd.reporting_period_id, pd.facility_id, sum(pd.amount_q1) AS amount_q1, sum(pd.amount_q2) AS amount_q2, sum(pd.amount_q3) AS amount_q3, sum(pd.amount_q4) AS amount_q4, sum(pd.total_budget) AS total_budget FROM planning_data pd JOIN planning_activities pa ON pa.id = pd.activity_id JOIN planning_categories pc ON pc.id = pa.category_id GROUP BY pc.id, pc.project_id, pd.reporting_period_id, pd.facility_id
public.v_planning_category_totals.name: v_planning_category_totals
